pageTitle: Add vehicles to Fleet Auto Pay

breadcrumbs.title: Add vehicles to Fleet Auto Pay

title.title: Add vehicles to Fleet Auto Pay

texts: The vehicle will be added to your Fleet Auto Pay indefinitely as long as the service is active.
Once a vehicle has been added, any Congestion Charges will be taken from your bank account by monthly direct debit.
The annual £10 charge for each vehicle added to your Fleet Auto Pay service will appear on your next monthly statement.
Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today, your vehicle qualifies for a100% discount and you don't have to pay the Congestion Charge.
If you believe that this is incorrect and you still want to pay the Congestion Charge, then you can continue.
This can change at any time - always check to see if you need to pay to drive within the zone.

Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today, this vehicle is exempt from the Congestion Charge. If you believe this information is incorrect and you still want to pay the Congestion Charge, add this vehicle or apply for a discount, then you can continue.
This may change without notice - always check to see if you need to pay to travel within the zone.
If the number plate is correct but the description shown is wrong, you can still pay for this vehicle.
Vehicle information is provided to TfL by the DVLA/DVA, so you'll need to let the DVLA/DVA know if your details are wrong or need to be updated.
We do not hold details for this vehicle
UK-registered: If your vehicle’s make and model details have not been returned, please make sure you entered the number plate correctly before continuing.
Registered outside the United Kingdom: We are unable to display the make, model and colour information. Confirm your details before continuing.
This vehicle can't be added to your Auto Pay. It has already been registered for Auto Pay by someone else on another account.
To add this vehicle you need to prove that you have authority to do so. Call us on 020 7649 9860 ( TfL call charges ) for more information. /corporate/terms-and-conditions/tfl-call-charges
If this isn't the vehicle you meant to add, click 'Edit' to select another vehicle.
You must add at least {0} vehicles.
